description:
The Twain-Lite is an ultralight pack raft designed for adventurers who want a bit more room for gear, bikes, or a furry companion. A piercing bow and increased waterline provide efficient tracking and reduces drag, perfect for big days of exploration. The TPU reinforced floor is expedition tough and includes an inflatable seat with adjustable backrest for comfort.

  • Tough TPU-coated 210D nylon sidewalls with a 840d nylon reinforced TPU floor
  • Leafield D7 valve for quick inflation and deflation
  • Inflatable seat for added comfort
  • Water rating: flat water, bays and inlets, class I rivers
  • Nylon tie downs for securing your bike or other gear
  • Weight capacity: up to 136kg (300lbs)
  • Included: Twain-Lite, EVA backband, inflation bag, inflation tube, compression strap set, inflatable seat, removable fin, TiZip zipper lubricant and emergency repair kit
name: Kokopelli Twain Lite Packraft
